1.title: The Roots & The Rise

episode of.title: True North - Inside the Rise of Toronto Basketball (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: Toronto is at the epicentre of Canada's NBA talent boom. We meet the pioneers who have grown the game and introduce a group of young hopefuls chasing their own hoop dream.

2.title: Elijah I: Just a Kid

episode of.title: True North - Inside the Rise of Toronto Basketball (TV Series 2018)

2.plot: Elijah Fisher is the top-ranked 12-year-old in the world. We go beyond the rankings and social media clout to see how a family manages the expectations that come with raising a child in the spotlight.

3.title: King Nation I: Play Small, Win Big

episode of.title: True North - Inside the Rise of Toronto Basketball (TV Series 2018)

3.plot: King Nation AAU are on the rise, but need a floor general. The responsibility falls on the shoulders of 5'9 point guard Keone Davis, 15, who leads the team into the Pittsburgh Jam Fest with high hopes.

4.title: Cordell I: Trust the Process

episode of.title: True North - Inside the Rise of Toronto Basketball (TV Series 2018)

4.plot: Cordell Veira enters his senior year playing for an underdog program. Time is ticking for Cordell to land a Division 1 scholarship offer while also carrying the weight of family redemption.

imdb.plot outline: True North provides an intimate look at the rise of the Toronto hoop dream through the stories of five young athletes, inspired by the wave of NBA talent coming from their city. In this nine part docu-series, director Ryan Sidhoo captures the raw emotion of navigating today's youth basketball machine through the eyes of the city's players, coaches and families at the centre of it.
imdb.title: True North - Inside the Rise of Toronto Basketball
akas: True North - Inside the Rise of Toronto Basketball (Canada)

In this nine part docu-series, director Ryan Sidhoo captures the raw emotion of navigating today's youth basketball machine through the eyes of the city's players, coaches and families at the centre of it.::NFB
